manzils.text: qaaf॰; gavaah hai quraan majeed
balki unhen to is baat par aashchary hua ki unake paas unheen mein se ek saavadhaan karanevaala aa gaya. phir inakaar karanevaale kahane lage, "yah to aashchary kee baat hai
kya jab ham mar jaenge aur mittee ho jaenge (to phir ham jeevi hokar palatenge)? yah palatana to bahut door kee baat hai
ham jaanate hai ki dharatee unamen jo kuchh kamee karatee hai aur hamaare paas surakshit rakhanevaalee ek kitaab bhee hai
balki unhonne saty ko jhuthala diya jab vah unake paas aaya. atah ve ek ulajhan bhee baat mein pade hue hai
achchha to kya unhonne apane oopar aakaash ko nahin dekha, hamane use kaisa banaaya aur use sajaaya. aur usamen koee daraar nahin
aur dharatee ko hamane phailaaya aur usame atal pahaad daal die. aur hamane usamen har prakaar kee sundar cheeze ugaee
aankhen kholane aur yaad dilaane ke uddeshy se, har bande ke lie jo rujoo karanevaala ho
aur hamane aakaash se barakatavaala paanee utaara, phir usase baag aur fasal ke anaaj.
aur oonche-oonche khajoor ke vrksh ugae jinake guchchhe tah par tah hote hai
bandon kee rojee ke lie. aur hamane us (paanee) ke dvaara nirjeev dharatee ko jeevan pradaan kiya. isee prakaar nikalana bhee hain
unase pahale nooh kee qaum, ar-ras vaale, samood
aad, firaun , loot ke bhaee
al-aika vaale aur tubba ke log bhee jhuthala chuke hai. pratyek ne rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya. antatah meree dhamakee satyaapit hokar rahee
kya ham pahalee baar paida karane se asamarth rahe? nahin, balki ve ek naee srshti ke vishay mein sandeh mein pade hai
hamane manushy ko paida kiya hai aur ham jaanate hai jo baaten usake jee mein aatee hai. aur ham usase usakee garadan kee rag se bhee adhik nikat hai
jab do praapt karanevaale (farishate) praapt kar rahe hote hai, daen se aur baen se ve lage baithe hote hai
koee baat usane kahee nahin ki usake paas ek nireekshak taiyaar rahata hai
aur maut kee behoshee le aaee avishv neey cheez! yahee vah cheez hai jisase too kataraata tha
aur narasingha phoonk diya gaya. yahee hai vah din jisakee dhamakee dee gaee thee
har vyakti is dasha mein aa gaya ki usake saath ek laanevaala hai aur ek gavaahee denevaala
too is cheez kee or se gafalat mein tha. ab hamane tujhase tera parada hata diya, to aaj teree nigaah badee tez hai
usake saathee ne kaha, "yah hai (teree saja)! mere paas kuchh (sahaayata ke lie) maujood nahin.
daal do, daal do, jahannam mein! har akrtagy dvesh rakhane vaale
bhalaee se rokanevaale, seema ka atikraman karanevaale, sandehagrast ko
jisane allaah ke saath kisee doosare ko poojy-prabhu thaharaaya. to daal do use kathor yaatana mein.
usaka saathee bola, "ai hamaare rab! mainne use sarakash nahin banaaya, balki vah svayan hee parale daraje kee gumaraahee mein tha.
kaha, "mere saamane mat jhagado. main to tumhen pahale hee apanee dhamakee se saavadhaan kar chuka tha.
mere yahaan baat badala nahin karatee aur na main apane bandon par tanik bhee atyaachaar karata hoon.
jis din ham jahannam se kahenge, "kya too bhar gaee?" aur vah kahegee, "kya abhee aur bhee kuchh hai
aur jannat dar rakhanevaalon ke lie nikat kar dee gaee, kuchh bhee door na rahee
yah hai vah cheez jisaka tumase vaada kiya jaata tha har rujoo karanevaale, badee nigaraanee rakhanevaale ke lie
jo rahamaan se dara paroksh mein aur aaya rujoo rahanevaala hrday lekar
pravesh karo us (jannat) mein salaamatee ke saath" vah shaashvat divas hai
unake lie usamen vah sab kuchh hai jo ve chaahe aur hamaare paas usase adhik bhee hai

unase pahale ham kitanee hee naslon ko vinasht kar chuke hai. ve log shakti mein unase kaheen badh-chadhakar the. (panaah kee talaash mein) unhonne nagaron ko chhaan maara, koee hai bhaagane ko thikaana
nishchay hee isamen us vyakti ke lie shiksha-saamagree hai jisake paas dil ho ya vah (dil se) haajir rahakar kaan lagae
hamane aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake beech hai chhah dinon mein paida kar diya aur hamen koee thakaan na chhoo sakee
atah jo kuchh ve kahate hai usapar dhairy se kaam lo aur apane rab kee prashansa kee tasabeeh karo; sooryoday se poorv aur sooryaast ke poorv
aur raat kee ghadiyon mein phir usakee tasabeeh karo aur sajadon ke pashchaat bhee
aur kaan lagaakar sun lega jis din pukaaranevaala atyant nikat ke sthaan se pukaarega
jis din log bhayankar cheekh ko satyatah sun rahe honge. vahee din hoga nikalane ka.
ham hee jeelan pradaan karate aur mrtyu dete hai aur hamaaree hee or antatah aana hai.
jis din dharatee unapar se phat jaegee aur ve tejee se nikal padenge. yah ikattha karana hamaare lie atyant saral hai
ham jaanate hai jo kuchh ve kahate hai, tum unapar koee zabaradastee karanevaale to ho nahin. atah tum quraan ke dvaara use naseehat karo jo hamaaree chetaavanee se dare
gavaah hai (havaen) jo gard-gubaar udaatee phiratee hai
phir bojh uthaatee hai
phir naramee se chalatee hai
phir maamale ko alag-alag karatee hai
nishchay hee tumase jis cheez ka vaada kiya jaata hai, vah saty hai
aur (karmon ka) badala avashy saamane aakar rahega
gavaah hai dhaariyonvaala aakaash.
nishchay hee tum us baat mein pade hue ho jinamen kathan bhinn-bhinn hai
isamen koee saraphira hee vimukh hota hai
maare jaen atakal daudaanevaale
jo gafalat mein pade hue hain bhoole hue
poochhate hai, "badale ka din kab aaega
jis din ve aag par tapae jaenge
chakhon maza. apane fitane (upadrav) ka! yaheen hai jisake lie tum jaldee macha rahe the.
nishchay hee dar rakhanevaale baagon aur sroton mein honge
jo kuchh unake rab ne unhen diya, ve use le rahe honge. nissandeh ve isase pahale uttamakaaron mein se the
raaton ko thoda hee sote the
aur vahee praatah kee ghadiyon mein kshama kee praarthana karate the
aur unake maalon mein maanganevaale aur dhanaheen ka haq tha
aur dharatee mein vishvaas karanevaalon ke lie bahut-see nishaaniyaan hai
aur ,svayan tumhaare apane aap mein bhee. to kya tum dekhate nahin
aur aakaash me hee tumhaaree rozee hai aur vah cheez bhee jisaka tumase vaada kiya ja raha hai
atah saugandh hai aakaash aur dharatee ke rab kee. nishchay hee vah saty baat hai aise hee jaise tum bolate ho
kya ibaraeem ke pratishthit atithiyon ka vrtaant tum tak pahancha
jab ve usake paas aae to kaha, "salaam hai tumapar!" usane bhee kaha, "salaam hai aap logon par bhee!" (aur jee mein kaha) "ye to aparichit log hain.
phir vah chupake se apane gharavaalon ke paas gaya aur ek mota-taaza bachhada (ka bhoona hua maans) le aaya
aur use unake saamane pesh kiya. kaha, "kya aap khaate nahin
phir usane dil mein unase dar mahasoos kiya. unhonne kaha, "darie nahin." aur unhonne use ek gyaanavaan ladake kee mangal-soochana dee
isapar usakee stree (chakit hokar) aage badhee aur usane apana munh peet liya aur kahane lagee, "ek boodhee baanjh (ke yahaan bachcha paida hoga)
unhonne kaha, "aisee hee tere rab ne kaha hai. nishchay hee vah bada tatvadarshee, gyaanavaan hai.
usane kaha, "ai (allaah ke bheje hue) dooton, tumhaare saamane kya muhim hai
unhonne kaha, "ham ek aparaadhee qaum kee or bheje gae hai
taaki unake oopar mittee ke patthar (kankad) barasaen
jo aapake rab ke yahaan seema ka atikraman karanevaalon ke lie chinhit hai.
phir vahaan jo eemaanavaale the, unhen hamane nikaal liya
kintu hamane vahaan ek ghar ke atirikt musalamaanon (aagyaakaariyon) ka aur koee ghar na paaya
isake pashchaat hamane vahaan un logon ke lie ek nishaanee chhod dee, jo dukhad yaatana se darate hai
aur moosa ke vrtaant mein bhee (nishaanee hai) jab hamane firaun ke paas ke spasht pramaan ke saath bheja
kintu usane apanee shakti ke kaaran munh pher liya aur kaha, "jaadoogar hai ya deevaana.
antatah hamane use aur usakee senaon ko pakad liya aur unhen gahare paanee mein phenk diya, is dasha mein ki vah nindaneey tha
aur aad mein bhee (tumhaare lie nishaanee hai) jabaki hamane unapar ashubh vaayu chala dee
vah jis cheez par se guzaree use usane jeern-sheern karake rakh diya
aur samudr mein bhee (tumhaare lie nishaanee hai) jabaki unase kaha gaya, "ek samay tak maze kar lo
kintu unhonne apane rab ke aadesh kee avahelana kee; phir kadak ne unhen aa liya aur ve dekhate rahe
phir ve na khade hee ho sake aur na apana bachaav hee kar sake
aur isase pahale nooh kee qaum ko bhee pakada. nishchay hee ve avagyaakaaree log the
aakaash ko hamane apane haath ke bal se banaaya aur ham badee samaee rakhanevaale hai
aur dharatee ko hamane bichhaaya, to ham kya hee khoob bichhaanevaale hai
aur hamane har cheez ke jode banae, taaki tum dhyaan do
atah allaah kee or daudo. main usakee or se tumhaare lie ek pratyaksh saavadhaan karanevaala hoon
aur allaah ke saath koee doosara poojy-prabhu na thaharao. main usakee or se tumhaare lie ek pratyaksh saavadhaan karanevaala hoon
isee tarah un logon ke paas bhee, jo unase pahale guzar chuke hai, jo bhee rasool aaya to unhonne bas yahee kaha, "jaadoogar hai ya deevaana
kya unhonne ek-doosare ko isakee vaseeyat kar rakhee hai? nahin, balki ve hai hee sarakash log
atah unase munh pher lo ab tumapar koee malaamat nahin
aur yaad dilaate raho, kyonki yaad dilaana eemaanavaalon ko laabh pahunchaata hai
mainne to jinnon aur manushyon ko keval isalie paida kiya hai ki ve meree bandagee kare
main unase koee rozee nahin chaahata aur na yah chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaen
nishchay hee allaah hee hai rozee denevaala, shaktishaalee, drdh
atah jin logon ne zulm kiya hai unake lie ek niyat paimaana hai; jaisa unake saathiyon ka niyat paimaana tha. atah ve mujhase jaldee na machaen
atah inakaar karanevaalon ke lie badee kharaabee hai, unake us din ke kaaran jisakee unhen dhamakee dee ja rahee hai
gavaah hai toor parvat
aur likhee huee kitaab
phaile hue jhillee ke panne mein
aur basa hua ghar
aur oonchee chhat
aur uphanata samudr
ki tere rab kee yaatana avashy ghatit hokar rahegee
jise taalanevaala koee nahin
jis dil aakaash buree tarah dagamagaega
aur pahaad chalate-phirate honge
to tabaahee hai us din, jhuthalaanevaalon ke lie
jo baat banaane mein lage hue khel rahe hai
jis din ve dhakke de-dekar jahannam kee or dhakele jaenge
(kaha jaega), "yahee hai vah aag jise tum jhuthalaate the
ab bhala (batao) yah koee jaadoo hai ya tumhe sujhaee nahin deta
jao, jhulaso usamen! ab dhairy se kaam lo ya dhairy se kaam na lo; tumhaare lie baraabar hai. tum vahee badala pa rahe ho, jo tum karate rahe the.
nishchay hee dar rakhanevaale baagon aur nematon mein honge
jo kuchh unake rab ne unhen diya hoga, usaka aanand le rahe honge aur is baat se ki unake rab ne unhen bhadakatee huee aag se bacha liya
maze se khao aur piyo un karmon ke badale mein jo tum karate rahe ho.
panktibaddh takhto par takiya lagae hue honge aur ham badee aankhonvaalee hooron (param roopavatee striyon) se unaka vivaah kar denge

jo log eemaan lae aur unakee santaan ne bhee eemaan ke saath usaka anusaran kiya, unakee santaan ko bhee ham unase mila denge, aur unake karm mein se kuchh bhee kam karake unhen nahin denge. har vyakti apanee kamaee ke badale mein bandhak hai
aur ham unhen meve aur maans, jisakee ve ichchha karenge die chale jaenge
ve vahaan aapas mein pyaale haathonhaath le rahe honge, jisamen na koee behoodagee hogee aur na gunaah par ubhaaranevaalee koee baat
aur unakee seva mein surakshit motiyon ke sadrsh kishor daudate phirate honge, jo khaas unheen (kee seva) ke lie honge
unamen se kuchh vyakti kuchh vyaktiyon kee or haal poochhate hue rukh karenge
kahenge, "nishchay hee ham pahale apane gharavaalon mein darate rahe hai
antatah allaah ne hamapar ehasaas kiya aur hamen garm vishailee vaayu kee yaatana se bacha liya
isase pahale ham use pukaarate rahe hai. nishchay hee vah sadavyavahaar karanevaala, atyant dayaavaan hai.
atah tum yaad dilaate raho. apane rab kee anukampa se na tum kaahin (dhongee bhavishyavakta) ho aur na deevaana
ya ve kahate hai, "vah kavi hai jisake lie ham kaal-chakr kee prateeksha kar rahe hai
kah do, "prateeksha karo! main bhee tumhaare saath prateeksha karata hoon.
ya unakee buddhiyaan yahee aadesh de rahee hai, ya ve hee hai sarakash log
ya ve kahate hai, "usane us (quraan) ko svayan hee kah liya hai?" nahin, balki ve eemaan nahin laate
achchha yadi ve sachche hai to unhen us jaisee vaanee le aanee chaahie
ya ve bina kisee cheez ke paida ho gae? ya ve svayan hee apane srashtaan hai
ya unhonne aakaashon aur dharatee ko paida kiya
ya unake paas tumhaare rab ke khazaane hai? ya vahee unake parirakshak hai
ya unake paas koee seedhee hai jisapar chadhakar ve (kaan lagaakar) sun lete hai? phir unamen se jisane sun liya ho to vah le aae spasht pramaan
ya us (allaah) ke lie betiyaan hai aur tumhaare apane lie bete
ya tum unase koee paarishraamik maangate ho ki ve taavaan ke bojh se dabe ja rahe hai
ya unake paas paroksh (spasht) hai jisake aadhaar par ve lie rahe ho
ya ve koee chaal chalana chaahate hai? to jin logon ne inakaar kiya vahee chaal kee lapet mein aanevaale hai
ya allaah ke atirikt unaka koee aur poojy-prabhu hai? allaah mahaan aur uchch hai usase jo ve saajhee thaharaate hai
yadi ve aakaash ka koee tukata girata hua dekhen to kahenge, "yah to parat par parat baadal hai
atah chhodo unhen, yahaan tak ki ve apane us din ka saamana karen jisamen unapar vajrapaat hoga
jis din unakee chaal unake kuchh bhee kaam na aaegee aur na unhen koee sahaayata hee milegee
aur nishchay hee jin logon ne zulm kiya unake lie ek yaatana hai usase hatakar bhee, parantu unamen se adhikatar jaanate nahin
apane rab ka faisala aane tak dhairy se kaam lo, tum to hamaaree aankhon mein ho, aur jab utho to apane rab ka gunagaan karo
raat kee kuchh ghadiyon mein bhee usakee tasabeeh karo, aur sitaaron ke peeth pherane ke samay (praatahkaal) bhee
gavaah hai taara, jab vah neeche ko aae
tumhaaree saathee (muhammah sall॰) na gumaraah hua aur na bahaka
aur na vah apanee ichchha se bolata hai
vah to bas ek prakaashana hai, jo kee ja rahee hai
use badee shaktiyonvaale ne sikhaaya
sthir reetivaale ne.
atah vah bharapoor hua, is haal mein ki vah kshitij ke uchchatam chhor par hai
phir vah nikat hua aur utar gaya
ab do kamaanon ke baraabar ya usase bhee adhik nikat ho gaya
tab usane apane bande kee or prakaashana kee, jo kuchh prakaashana kee.
dil ne koee dhokha nahin diya, jo kuchh usane dekha
ab kya tum us cheez par jhagadate ho, jise vah dekh raha hai
aur nishchay hee vah use ek baar aur
sidaratul muntaha (paralee seema ke ber) ke paas utarate dekh chuka hai
usee ke nikat jannatul maava (thikaanevaalee jannat) hai.
jabaki chha raha tha us ber par, jo kuchh chha raha tha
nigaah na to tedhee hui aur na had se aage badhee
nishchay hee usane apane rab kee badee-badee nishaaniyaan dekheen
to kya tumane laat aur uzza
aur teesaree ek aur (devee) manaat par vichaar kiya
kya tumhaare lie to bete hai unake lie betiyaan
tab to yah bahut bedhanga aur anyaayapoorn bantavaara hua

ve to bas kuchh naam hai jo tumane aur tumhaare baap-daada ne rakh lie hai. allaah ne unake lie koee sanad nahin utaaree. ve to keval atakal ke peechhe chale rahe hai aur unake peechhe jo unake man kee ichchha hotee hai. haalaanki unake paas unake rab kee or se maargadarshan aa chuka hai
(kya unakee deviyaan unhen laabh pahuncha sakatee hai) ya manushy vah kuchh pa lega, jisakee vah kaamana karata hai
aakhirat aur duniya ka maalik to allaah hee hai
aakaashon mein kitane hee farishte hai, unakee sifaarish kuchh kaam nahin aaegee; yadi kaam aa sakatee hai to isake pashchaat hee ki allaah anumati de, jise chaahe aur pasand kare.
jo log aakhirat ko nahin maanate, ve farishton ke deviyon ke naam se abhihit karate hai
haalaanki is vishay mein unhen koee gyaan nahin. ve keval atakal ke peechhe chalate hai, haalaanki saty se jo laabh pahunchata hai vah atakal se kadaapi nahin pahunch sakata.
atah tum usako dhyaan mein na lao jo hamaare zikr se munh modata hai aur saansaarik jeevan ke siva usane kuchh nahin chaaha

aise logon ke gyaan kee pahunch bas yaheen tak hai. nishchay hee tumhaara rab hee use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai jo usake maarg se bhatak gaya aur vahee use bhee bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai jisane seedha maarg apanaaya
allaah hee ka hai jo kuchh aakaashon mein hai aur jo kuchh dharatee mein hai, taaki jin logon ne buraee kee vah unhen unake kie ka badala de. aur jin logon ne bhalaee kee unhen achchha badala de

ve log jo bade gunaahon aur ashleel karmon se bachate hai, yah aur baat hai ki sanyogabash koee chhotee buraee unase ho jae. nishchay hee tumhaara rab kshamaasheelata me bada vyaapak hai. vah tumhen us samay se bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai, jabaki usane tumhen dharatee se paida kiya aur jabaki tum apanee maano ke peton mein bhrun avastha mein the. atah apane man kee pavitrata aur nikhaar ka daava na karo. vah us vyakti ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai, jisane dar rakha
kya tumane us vyakti ko dekha jisane munh phera
aur thoda-sa dekar ruk gaya
kya usake paas paroksh ka gyaan hai ki vah dekh raha hai
ya usako un baaton kee khabar nahin pahunchee, jo moosa kee kitaabon mein hai
aur ibaraaheem kee (kitaabon mein hai), jisane allaah kee bandagee ka) poora-poora haq ada kar diya
yah ki koee bojh uthaanevaala kisee doosare ka bojh na uthaega
aur yah ki manushy ke lie bas vahee hai jisake lie usane prayaas kiya
aur yah ki usaka prayaas sheeghr hee dekha jaega.
phir use poora badala diya jaega
aur yah ki ant mein pahunchana tumhaare rab hee kee or hai
aur yah ki vahee hai jo hansaata aur rulaata hai
aur yah ki vahee jo maarata aur jilaata hai
aur yah ki vahee hai jisane nar aur maada ke jode paida kie
ek boond se, jab vah tapakaee jaatee hai
aur yah ki usee ke zimme dobaara uthaana bhee hai
aur yah ki vahee hai jisane dhanee aur poonjeepati banaaya
aur yah ki vahee hai jo sheara (naamak taare) ka rab hai
aur yah ki vahee hai usee ne praacheen aad ko vinasht kiya
aur samood ko bhee. phir kisee ko baaqee na chhoda.
aur usase pahale nooh kee qaum ko bhee. beshak ve zaalim aur sarakash the
ulat jaanevaalee bastee ko bhee phenk diya.
to dhank liya use jis cheez ne dhank liya
phir too apane rab ke chamatkaaron mein se kis-kis ke vishay mein sandeh karega
yah pahale ke saavadhaan-kartaon ke sadrsh ek saavadhaan karanevaala hai
nikat aanevaalee (qiyaamat kee ghadee) nikat aa gaee
allaah ke siva koee nahin jo use prakat kar de
ab kya tum is vaanee par aashchary karate ho
aur hansate ho aur rote nahin
jabaki tum ghamandee aur gaaphil ho
atah allaah ko sajada karo aur bandagee karo
vah ghadee nikat aur lagee aur chaand phat gaya
kintu haal yah hai ki yadi ve koee nishaanee dekh bhee len to taal jaenge aur kahenge, "yah to jaadoo hai, pahale se chala aa raha hai
unhonne jhuthalaaya aur apanee ichchhaon ka anusaran kiya; kintu har maamale ke lie ek niyat avadhi hai.
unake paas ateet ko aisee khabaren aa chukee hai, jinamen taadana arthaat poornatah tatvadarsheeta hai.
kintu chetaavaniyaan unake kuchh kaam nahin aa rahee hai
atah unase rukh pher lo - jis din pukaaranevaala ek atyant apriy cheez kee or pukaarega
ve apanee jhukee huee nigaahon ke saath apanee krabon se nikal rahe honge, maano ve bikharee huee tiddiyaan hai
daud padane ko pukaaranevaale kee or. inakaar karanevaale kahenge, "yah to ek kathin din hai
unase pahale nooh kee qaum ne bhee jhuthalaaya. unhonne hamaare bande ko jhootha thaharaaya aur kaha, "yah to deevaana hai!" aur vah buree tarah jhidaka gaya
ant mein usane apane rab ko pukaara ki "main daba hua hoon. ab too badala le.
tab hamane moosalaadhaar barasate hue paanee se aakaash ke dvaar khol die
aur dharatee ko pravaahit sroton mein parivartit kar diya, aur saara paanee us kaam ke lie mil gaya jo niyat ho chuka tha
aur hamane use ek takhton aur keelonvaalee (nauka) par savaar kiya
jo hamaaree nigaahon ke saamane chal rahee thee - yah badala tha us vyakti ke lie jisakee qadr nahin kee gaee.

nishchay hee hamane apane rasoolon ko spasht pramaanon ke saath bheja aur unake lie kitaab aur tula utaaree, taaki log inasaaf par qaayam hon. aur loha bhee utaara, jisamen badee dahashat hai aur logon ke lie kitane hee laabh hai., aur (kitaab evan tula isalie bhee utaaree) taaki allaah jaan le ki kaun paroksh mein rahate hue usakee aur usake rasoolon kee sahaayata karata hai. nishchay hee allaah shaktishaalee, prabhutvashaalee hai
hamane nooh aur ibaraaheem ko bheja aur un donon kee santaan mein paigambaree aur qitaab rakh dee. phir unamen se kisee ne to sammaarg apanaaya; kintu unamen se adhikatar avagyaakaaree the

phir unake peechh unheen ke pad-chinhon par hamane apane doosare rasoolon ko bheja aur hamane unake peechhe marayam ke bete eesa ko bheja aur use injeel pradaan kee. aur jin logon ne usaka anusaran kiya, unake dilon mein hamane karuna aur daya rakh dee. raha sannyaas, to use unhonne svayan ghada tha. hamane use unake lie anivaary nahin kiya tha, yadi anivaary kiya tha to keval allaah kee prasannata kee chaahat. phir ve usaka nirvaah na kar saken, jaisa ki unaka nirvaah karana chaahie tha. atah un logon ko, jo unamen se vaastav mein eemaan lae the, unaka badala hamane (unhen) pradaan kiya. kintu unamen se adhikatar avagyaakaaree hee hai

taaki kitaabavaale yah na samajhen ki allaah ke anugrah mein se ve kisee cheez par adhikaar na praapt kar sakenge aur yah ki anugrah allaah ke haath mein hai, jise chaahata hai pradaan karata hai. allaah bade anugrah ka maalik hai

allaah ne us stree kee baat sun lee jo apane pati ke vishay mein tumase jhagad rahee hai aur allaah se shikaayat kie jaatee hai. allaah tum donon kee baatacheet sun raha hai. nishchay hee allaah sab kuchh sunanevaala, dekhanevaala hai

tumamen se jo log apanee striyon se zihaar karate hain, unakee maen ve nahin hai, unakee maen to vahee hai jinhonne unako janm diya hai. yah avashy hai ki ve log ek anuchit baat aur jhooth kahate hai. aur nishchay hee allaah taal jaanevaala atyant kshamaasheel hai

jo log apanee striyon se zihaar karate hain; phir jo baat unhonne kahee thee usase rujoo karate hai, to isase pahale ki donon ek-doosare ko haath lagaen ek gardan aazaad karanee hogee. yah vah baat hai jisakee tumhen naseehat kee jaatee hai, aur tum jo kuchh karate ho allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai

kintu jis kisee ko gulaam praapt na ho to vah nirantar do maah roze rakhe, isase pahale ki ve donon ek-doosare ko haath lagaen aur jis kisee ko isakee bhee saamarthy na ho to saath muhataajon ko bhojan karaana hoga. yah isalie ki tum allaah aur usake rasool par eemaanavaale siddh ho sako. ye allaah kee nirdhaarit kee huee seemaen hai. aur inakaar karanevaale ke lie dukhad yaatana hai

jis din allaah un sabako utha khada karega aur jo kuchh unhonne kiya hoga, usase unhen avagat kara dega. allaah ne usakee ganana kar rakhee hai, aur ve use bhoole hue hai, aur allaah har cheez ka saakshee hai

allaah ne unake lie kathor yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai. nishchay hee bura hai jo ve kar rahe hai
unhonne apanee qasamon ko dhaal bana rakha hai. atah ve allaah ke maarg se (logon ko) rokate hai. to unake lie rusava karanevaalee yaatana hai
allaah se bachaane ke lie na unake maal unake kuchh kaam aaenge aur na unakee santaan. ve aagavaale hain. usee mein ve sadaiv rahenge

jis din allaah un sabako uthaega to ve usake saamane bhee isee tarah qasamen khaenge, jis tarah tumhaare saamane qasamen khaate hai aur samajhate hain ki ve kisee buniyaad par hai. saavadhaan raho, nishchay hee vahee jhoothe hai

unapar shaitaan ne pooree tarah apana prabhaav jama liya hai. atah usane allaah kee yaad ko unase bhula diya. ve shaitaan kee paarteevaale hain. saavadhaan raho shaitaan kee paarteevaale hee ghaate mein rahanevaale hain
nishchay hee jo log allaah aur usake rasool ka virodh karate hai ve atyant apamaanit logon mein se hai
allaah ne lie diya hai, "main aur mere rasool hee vijayee hokar rahenge." nissandeh allaah shaktimaan, prabhutvashaalee hai

tum un logon ko aisa kabhee nahin paoge jo allaah aur antim di par eemaan rakhate hai ki ve un logon se prem karate ho jinhonne allaah aur usake rasool ka virodh kiya, yadyapi ve unake apane baap hon ya unake apane bete ho ya unake apane bhaee ya unake apane parivaaravaale hee ho. vahee log hain jinake dilon mein allaah ne eemaan ko ankit kar diya hai aur apanee or se ek aatma ke dvaara unhen shakti dee hai. aur unhen vah aise baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hongee; jahaan ve sadaiv rahenge. allaah unase raazee hua aur ve bhee usase raazee hue. ve allaah kee paartee ke log hai. saavadhaan raho, nishchay hee allaah kee paarteevaale hee saphal hai
allaah kee tasabeeh kee hai har us cheez ne jo aakaashon aur dharatee mein hai, aur vahee prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai

vahee hai jisane kitaabavaalon mein se un logon ko jinhonne inakaar kiya, unake gharon se pahale hee jamaavade mein nikal baahar kiya. tumhen gumaan na tha ki unakee gadhiyaan allaah se unhen bacha lengee. kintu allaah unapar vahaan se aaya jisaka unhen gumaan bhee na tha. aur usane unake dilon mein rob daal diya ki ve apane gharon ko svayan apane haathon aur eemaanavaalon ke haathon bhee ujaadane lage. atah shiksha grahan karo, ai drshti rakhanevaalo
yadi allaah ne unake lie desh nikaala na likh diya hota to duniya mein hee vah unhen avashy yaatana de deta, aur aakhirat mein to unake lie aag kee yaatana hai hee
yah isalie ki unhonne allaah aur usake rasool ka muqaala karane kee koshish kee. aur jo koee allaah ka muqaabala karata hai to nishchay hee allaah kee yaatana bahut kathor hai

tumane khajoor ke jo vrksh kaate ya unhen unakee jadon par khada chhod diya to yah allaah hee kee anugya se hua (taaki eemaanavaalon ke lie aasaanee paida kare) aur isalie ki vah avagyaakaariyon ko rusava kare

jo kuchh allaah ne apane rasool kee or bastiyonvaalon se lekar palataaya vah allaah aur rasool aur (muhataaj) naatedaar aur anaathon aur muhataajon aur musaafir ke lie hai, taaki vah (maal) tumhaare maaladaaron hee ke beech chakkar na lagaata rahe - rasool jo kuchh tumhen de use le lo aur jis cheez se tumhen rok de usase ruk jao, aur allaah ka dar rakho. nishchay hee allaah kee yaatana bahut kathor hai.

vah gareeb muhaajiron ke lie hai, jo apane gharon aur apane maalon se is haalat mein nikaal baahar kie gae hai ki ve allaah ka udaar anugrah aur usakee prasannata kee talaash mein hai aur allaah aur usake rasool kee sahaayata kar rahe hai, aur vahee vaastav mein sachche hai

aur unake lie jo unase pahale hee se hijarat ke ghar (madeena) mein thikaana banae hue hai aur eemaan par jame hue hai, ve unase prem karate hai jo hijarat karake unake yahaan aae hai aur jo kuchh bhee unhen diya gaya usase ve apane seenon mein koee khatak nahin paate aur ve unhen apane muqaabale mein praathamikata dete hai, yadyapi apanee jagah ve svayan muhataaj hee hon. aur jo apane man ke lobh aur krpanata se bacha liya jae aise log hee saphal hai

aur (is maal mein unaka bhee hissa hai) jo unake baad aae, ve kahate hai, "ai hamaare rab! hamen kshama kar de aur hamaare un bhaiyon ko bhee jo eemaanalaane mein hamase agrasar rahe aur hamaare dilon mein eemaanavaalon ke lie koee vidvesh na rakh. ai hamaare rab! too nishchay hee bada karunaamay, atyant dayaavaan hai.

kya tumane un logon ko nahin dekha jinhonne kapataachaar kee neeti apanaee hain, ve apane kitaabavaale un bhaiyon se, jo inakaar kee neeti apanae hue hai, kahate hai, "yadi tumhen nikaala gaya to ham bhee avashy hee tumhaare saath nikal jaenge aur tumhaare maamale mein kisee kee baat kabhee bhee nahin maanenge. aur yadi tumase yuddh kiya gaya to ham avashy tumhaaree sahaayata karenge." kintu allaah gavaahee deta hai ki ve bilakul jhoothe hai

yadi ve nikaale gae to ve unake saath nahin nikalenge aur yadi unase yuddh hua to ve unakee sahaayata kadaapi na karenge aur yadi unakee sahaayata karen bhee to peeth phenr jaenge. phir unhen koee sahaayata praapt na hogee
unake dilon mein allaah se badhakar tumhaara bhay samaaya hua hai. yah isalie ki ve aise log hai jo samajhate nahin

ve ikatthe hokar bhee tumase (khule maidaan mein) nahin ladege, qilaaband bastiyon ya deevaaron ke peechh hon to yah aur baat hai. unakee aapas mein sakht ladaee hai. tum unhen ikattha samajhate ho! haalaanki unake dil phate hue hai. yah isalie ki ve aise log hai jo buddhi se kaam nahin lete
unakee haalat unheen logon jaisee hai jo unase pahale nikat kaal mein apane kie ke vabaal ka maza chakh chuke hai, aur unake lie dukhad yaatana bhee hai

phir un donon ka parinaam yah hua ki donon aag mein gae, jahaan sadaiv rahenge. aur zaalimon ka yahee badala hai

vahee allaah hai jo sanrachana ka praaroopak hai, astitv pradaan karanevaala, roop denevaala hai. usee ke lie achchhe naam hai. jo cheez bhee aakaashon aur dharatee mein hai, usee kee tasabeeh kar rahee hai. aur vah prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai

allaah to un logon se prem rakhata hai jo usake maarg mein panktibaddh hokar ladate hai maano ve seesa pilaee hue deevaar hai

ai eemaan laanevaalo! kya main tumhen ek aisa vyaapaar bataoon jo tumhen dukhad yaatana se bacha le
tumhen eemaan laana hai allaah aur usake rasool par, aur jihaad karana hai allaah ke maarg mein apane maalon aur apanee jaanon se. yahee tumhaare lie uttam hai, yadi tum jaano

vah tumhaare gunaahon ko kshama kar dega aur tumhen aise baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hogee aur un achchhe gharon mein bhee jo sadaabahaar baagon mein honge. yahee badee saphalata hai
aur doosaree cheez bhee jo tumhen priy hai (pradaan karega), "allaah kee or se sahaayata aur nikat praapt honevaalee vijay," eemaanavaalon ko shubhasoochana de do

ai eemaan laanevaalon! allaah ke sahaayak bano, jaisa ki marayam ke bete eesa ne havaariyon (saathiyon) se kaha tha, "kaun hai allaah kee or (bulaane mein) mere sahaayak?" havaariyon ne kaha, "ham hai allaah ke sahaayak." phir isaraeel kee santaan mein se ek giroh eemaan le aaya aur ek giroh na inakaar kiya. atah hamane un logon ko, jo eemaan lae the, unake apane shatruon ke mukaabale mein shakti pradaan kee, to ve chhaakar rahe
allaah kee tasabeeh kar rahee hai har vah cheez jo aakaashon mein hai aur jo dharatee mein hai, jo samraat hai, atyant pavitr, prabhutvashaalee tatvadarshee

vahee hai jisane ummiyon mein unheen mein se ek rasool uthaaya jo unhen usakee aayaten padhakar sunaata hai, unhen nikhaarata hai aur unhen kitaab aur hikamat (tatvadarshita) kee shiksha deta hai, yadyapi isase pahale to ve khulee huee gumaraahee mein pade hue the
aur un doosare logon ko bhee (kitaab aur hikamat kee shiksha de) jo abhee unase mile nahin hai, ve unheen mein se honge. aur vahee prabhutvashaalee, tatvashaalee hai
yah allaah ka udaar anugrah hai, jisako chaahata hai use pradaan karata hai. allaah bade anugrah ka maalik hai

jin logon par taaraat ka bojh daala gaya, kintu unhonne use na uthaaya, unakee misaal us gadhe kee-see hai jo kitaabe laade hue ho. bahut hee buree misaal hai un logon kee jinhonne allaah kee aayaton ko jhuthala diya. allaah zaalimon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya karata
kah do, "ai logon, jo yahoodee hue ho! yadi tumhen yah gumaan hai ki saare manushyon ko chhodakar tum hee allaah ke premapaatr ho to mrtyu kee kaamana karo, yadi tum sachche ho.
kintu ve kabhee bhee usakee kaamana karenge, us (karm) ke kaaran jo unake haathon ne aage bheja hai. allaah zaalimon ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai

kah do, "mrtyu jisase tum bhaagate ho, vah to tumhen milakar rahegee, phir tum usakee or lautae jaoge jo chhipe aur khule ka jaananevaala hai. aur vah tumhen usase avagat kara dega jo kuchh tum karate rahe hoge.
ai eemaan laanevaalo, jab juma ke din namaaz ke lie pukaara jae to allaah kee yaad kee or daud pado aur kray-vikray chhod do. yah tumhaare lie achchha hai, yadi tum jaano
phir jab namaaz pooree ho jae to dharatee mein phail jao aur allaah ka udaar anugrah (rojee) talaash karo, aur allaah ko bahut zyaada yaad karate raho, taaki tum saphal ho.

kintu jab ve vyavahaar aur khel-tamaasha dekhate hai to usakee or toot padate hai aur tumhen khada chhod dete hai. kah do, "jo kuchh allaah ke paas hai vah tamaashe aur vyaapaar se kaheen achchha hai. aur allaah sabase achchha aajeevika pradaan karanevaala hai.

jab munaafik (kapataachaaree) tumhaare paas aate hai to kahate hai, "ham gavaahee dete hai ki nishchay hee aap allaah ke rasool hai." allaah jaanata hai ki nissandeh tum usake rasool ho, kientu allaah gavaahee deta hai ki ye munaafik bilakul jhoothe hai
unhonne apanee qasamon ko dhaal bana rakha hai, is prakaar ve allaah ke maarg se rokate hai. nishchay hee bura hai jo ve kar rahe hai
yah is kaaran ki ve eemaan lae, phir inakaar kiya, atah unake dilon par muhar laga dee gaee, ab ve kuchh nahin samajhate

tum unhen dekhate ho to unake shareer (baahy roop) tumhen achchhe lagate hai, aurayadi ve baat karen to unakee baat tum sunate rah jao. kintu yah aisa hee hai maano ve lakadee ke kunde hai, jinhen (deevaar ke sahaare) khada kar diya gaya ho. har zor kee aavaaz ko ve apane hee viruddh samajhate hai. vahee vaastavik shatru hain, atah unase bachakar raho. allaah kee maar unapar. ve kahaan ulte phire ja rahe hai
aur jab unase kaha jaata hai, "aao, allaah ka rasool tumhaare lie kshama kee praarthana kare." to ve apane sir matakaate hai aur tum dekhate ho ki ghamand ke saath khinche rahate hai

unake lie baraabar hai chaahe tum unake kie kshama kee praarthana karo ya unake lie kshama kee praarthana na karo. allaah unhen kadaapi kshama na karega. nishchay hee allaah avagyaakaariyon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya karata

ve vaheen log hai jo kahate hai, "un logon par kharch na karo jo allaah ke rasool ke paas rahanevaale hai, taaki ve titar-bitar ho jaen." haalaanki aakaashon aur dharatee ke khajaane allaah hee ke hai, kintu ve munaafiq samajhate nahin

ve kahate hai, "yadi ham madeena lautakar gae to jo adhik shaktivaala hai, vah heenatar (vyaktiyon) ko vahaan se nikaal baahar karega." haalaanki shakti allaah aur usake rasool aur mominon ke lie hai, kintu ve munaafiq jaanate nahin
ai eemaan laanevaalo! tumhaare maal tumhen allaah kee yaad se gaafil na kar den aur na tumhaaree santaan hee. jo koee aisa kare to aise hee log ghaate mein rahanevaale hai

hamane tumhen jo kuchh diya hai usamen se kharch karo isase pahale ki tumamen se kisee kee mrtyu aa jae aur us samay vah karane lage, "ai mere rab! toone mujhe kuchh thode samay tak aur muhalat kyon na dee ki main sadaqa (daan) karata (mujhe muhalat de ki main sadaqa karoon) aur achchhe logon mein sammilit ho jaoon.
kintu allaah, kisee vyakti ko jab tak usaka niyat samay aa jaata hai, kadaapi muhalat nahin deta. aur jo kuchh tum karate ho allaah usakee pooree khabar rakhata hai
allaah kee tasabeeh kar rahee hai har vah cheez jo aakaashon mein hai aur jo dharatee mein hai. usee kee baadashaahee hai aur usee ke lie prashansa hai aur use har cheez kee saamarthy praapt hai
vahee hai jisane tumhen paida kiya, phir tumamen se koee to inakaar karanevaala hai aur tumamen se koee eemaanavaala hai, aur tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho allaah use dekh raha hota hai
usane aakaashon aur dharatee ko haq ke saath paida kiya aur tumhaara roop banaaya, to bahut hee achchhe banae tumhaare roop aur usee kee or antatah jaana hai
vah jaanata hai jo kuchh aakaashon aur dharatee mein hai aur use bhee jaanata hai jo kuchh tum chhipaate ho aur jo kuchh tum prakat karate ho. allaah to seenon mein chhipee baat tak ko jaanata hai
kya tumhen un logon kee khabar nahin pahunchee jinhonne isase pahale inakaar kiya tha, phir unhonne apane karm ke vabaal ka maza chakha aur unake lie ek dukhad yaatana bhee hai

yah is kaaran ki unake paas unake rasool spasht pramaan lekar aate rahe, kintu unhonne kaha, "kya manushy hamen maarg dikhaenge?" is prakaar unhonne inakaar kiya aur munh pher liya, tab allaah bhee unase beparavaah ho gaya. allaah to hai hee nisprh, apane aap mein svayan prashansit

jin logon ne inakaar kiya unhonne daava kiya ve marane ke pashchaat kadaapi na uthae jaenge. kah do, "kyon nahin, mere rab kee qasam! tum avashy uthae jaoge, phir jo kuchh tumane kiya hai usase tumhen avagat kara diya jaega. aur allaah ke lie yah atyant saral hai.
atah eemaan lao, allaah par aur usake rasool par aur us prakaash par jise hamane avatarit kiya hai. tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho allaah usakee pooree khabar rakhata hai

ikattha hone ke din vah tumhen ikattha karega, vah paraspar laabh-haani ka din hoga. jo bhee allaah par eemaan lae aur achchha karm kare usakee buraeeyaan allaah usase door kar dega aur use aise baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hongee, unamen ve sadaiv rahenge. yahee badee saphalata hai
rahe ve log jinhonne inakaar kiya aur hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya, vahee aagavaale hai jisamen ve sadaiv rahenge. antatah lautakar pahunchane kee vah bahut hee buree jagah hai
allaah kee anugya ke bina koee bhee museebat nahin aatee. jo allaah par eemaan le aae allaah usake dil ko maarg dikhaata hai, aur allaah har cheej ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
allaah kee aagya ka paalan karo aur rasool kee aagya ka paalan karo, kintu yadi tum munh modate ho to hamaare rasool par bas spasht roop se (sandesh) pahuncha dene kee zimmedaaree hai
allaah vah hai jisake siva koee poojy-prabhu nahin. atah allaah hee par eemaanavaalon ko bharosa karana chaahie

ai eemaan laanevaalo, tumhaaree patniyon aur tumhaaree santaan mein se kuchh aise bhee hai jo tumhaare shatru hai. atah unase hoshiyaar raho. aur yadi tum maaf kar do aur taal jao aur kshama kar do nishchay hee allaah bada kshamaasheel, atyant dayaavaan hai
tumhaare maal aur tumhaaree santaan to keval ek aazamaish hai, aur allaah hee hai jisake paas bada pratidaan hai

atah jahaan tak tumhaare bas mein ho allaah ka dar rakho aur suno aur aagyaapaalan karo aur kharch karo apanee bhalaee ke lie. aur jo apane man ke lobh evan krpanata se surakshit raha to aise hee log saphal hai
yadi tum allaah ko achchha rn do to vah use tumhaare lie kaee guna badha dega aur tumhen kshama kar dega. allaah bada gunagraahak aur sahanasheel hai
paroksh aur pratyaksh ko jaanata hai, prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai

ai nabee! jab tum log striyon ko talaaq do to unhen talaaq unakee iddat ke hisaab se do. aur iddat kee ganana karo aur allaah ka dar rakho, jo tumhaara rab hai. unhen unake gharon se na nikaalo aur na ve svayan nikalen, sivaay isake ki ve koee spasht. ashobhaneey karm kar baithen. ye allaah kee niyat kee huee seemaen hai - aur jo allaah kee seemaon ka ullanghan kare to usane svayan apane aap par zulm kiya - tum nahin jaanate, kadaachit is (talaaq) ke pashchaat allaah koee soorat paida kar de

phir jab ve apanee niyat iddat ko pahunche to ya to unhen bhalee reeti se rok lo ya bhalee reeti se alag kar do. aur apane mein se do nyaayapriy aadamiyon ko gavaah bana do aur allaah ke lie gavaahee ko durust rakho. isakee naseehat us vyakti ko kee jaatee hai jo allaah aur antim din par eemaan rakhega usake lie vah (pareshaanee se) nikalane ka raah paida kar dega

aur use vahaan se rozee dega jisaka use gumaan bhee na hoga. jo allaah par bharosa kare to vah usake lie kaafee hai. nishchay hee allaah apana kaam poora karake rahata hai. allaah ne har cheez ka ek andaaja niyat kar rakha hai

aur tumhaaree striyon mein se jo maasik dharm se niraash ho chukee hon, yadi tumhen sandeh ho to unakee iddat teen maas hai aur isee prakaar unakee bhee jo abhee rajasvala nahin huee. aur jo garbhavatee striyaan ho unakee iddat unake shishu-prasav tak hai. jo koee allaah ka dar rakhega usake maamale mein vah aasaanee paida kar dega
yah allaah ka aadesh hai jo usane tumhaaree or utaara hai. aur jo koee allaah ka dar rakhega usase vah usakee buraeeyaan door kar dega aur usake pratidaan ko bada kar dega

apanee haisiyat ke anusaar yahaan tum svayan rahate ho unhen bhee usee jagah rakho. aur unhen tang karane ke lie unhen haani na pahunchao. aur yadi ve garbhavatee ho to unapar kharch karate raho jab tak ki unaka shishu-prasav na ho jae. phir yadi ve tumhaare lie (shishu ko) doodh pilaen to tum unhen unaka paarishraamik do aur aapas mein bhalee reeti se paraspar baatacheet ke dvaar koee baat tay kar lo. aur yadi tum donon mein koee kathinaee ho to phir koee doosaree stree usake lie doodh pila degee

chaahie ki samaee (saamarthy) vaala apanee samaee ke anusaar kharch kare aur jise usakee rozee napee-tulee milee ho to use chaahie ki allaah ne use jo kuchh bhee diya hai usee mein se vah kharch kare. jitana kuchh diya hai usase badhakar allaah kisee vyakti par zimmedaaree ka bojh nahin daalata. jald hee allaah kathinaee ke baad aasaanee paida kar dega
kitanee hee bastiyaan hain jinhonne rab aur usake rasoolon ke aadesh ke muqaabale mein sarakashee kee, to hamane unakee sakht pakad kee aur unhen buree yaatana dee
atah unhonne apane kie ke vabaal ka maza chakh liya aur unakee kaary-neeti ka parinaam ghaata hee raha
allaah ne unake lie kathor yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai. atah ai buddhi aur samajhavaalo jo eemaan lae ho! allaah ka dar rakho. allaah ne tumhaaree or ek yaadadihaanee utaar dee hai

(arthaat) ek rasool jo tumhen allaah kee spasht aayaten padhakar sunaata hai, taaki vah un logon ko, jo eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie, andheron se nikaalakar prakaash kee or le aae. jo koee allaah par eemaan lae aur achchha karm kare, use vah aise baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hogee - aise log unamen sadaiv rahenge - allaah ne unake lie uttam rozee rakhee hai

allaah hee hai jisane saat aakaash banae aur unhee ke sadrsh dharatee se bhee. unake beech (usaka) aadesh utarata rahata hai taaki tum jaan lo ki allaah ko har cheez ka saamarthy praapt hai aur yah ki allaah har cheez ko apanee gyaan-paridhi mein lie hue hai
ai nabee! jis cheez ko allaah ne tumhaare lie vaidh thaharaaya hai use tum apanee patniyon kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie kyo avaidh karate ho? allaah bada kshamaasheel, atyant dayaavaan hai
allaah ne tum logon ke lie tumhaaree apanee qasamon kee paabandee se nikalane ka upaay nishchit kar diya hai. allaah tumhaara sanrakshak hai aur vahee sarvagy, atyant tatvadarshee hai

jab nabee ne apanee patniyon mein se kisee se ek gopaneey baat kahee, phir jab usane usakee khabar kar dee aur allaah ne use usapar zaahir kar diya, to usane use kisee had tak bata diya aur kisee had tak taal gaya. phir jab usane usakee use khabar kee to vah bolee, "aapako isakee khabar kisane dee?" usane kaha, "mujhe usane khabar dee jo sab kuchh jaananevaala, khabar rakhanevaala hai.

yadi tum donon allaah kee or rujoo ho to tumhaare dil to jhuk hee chuke hain, kintu yadi tum usake viruddh ek-doosare kee sahaayata karogee to allaah usakee sanrakshak hai, aur jibareel aur nek eemaanavaale bhee, aur isake baad farishte bhee usake sahaayak hai

isakee bahut sambhaavana hai ki yadi vah tumhen talaaq de de to usaka rab tumhaare badale mein tumase achchhee patniyaan use pradaan kare - muslim, eemaanavaalee, aagyaakaarinee, tauba karanevaalee, ibaadat karanevaalee, (allaah ke maarg mein) safar karanevaalee, vivaahita aur kunvaariyaan bhee

ai eemaan laanevaalo! apane aapako aur apane gharavaalon ko us aag se bachao jisaka eedhan manushy aur patthar honge, jisapar kathor svabhaav ke aise balashaalee farishte niyukt honge jo allaah kee avagya usamen nahin karenge jo aadesh bhee vah unhen dega, aur ve vahee karenge jisaka unhen aadesh diya jaega
ai inakaar karanevaalo! aaj uzr pesh na karo. tumhen badale mein vahee to diya ja raha hai jo kuchh tum karate rahe ho

ai eemaan laanevaale! allaah ke aage tauba karo, vishuddh tauba. bahut sambhav hai ki tumhaara rab tumhaaree buraiyaan tumase door kar de aur tumhen aise baagon mein daakhil kare jinake neeche nahare bah rahee hongee, jis din allaah nabee ko aur unako jo eemaan laakar usake saath hue, rusava na karega. unaka prakaash unake aage-aage daud raha hoga aur unake daahine haath me hoga. ve kah rahe honge, "ai hamaare rab! hamaare lie hamaare prakaash ko poorn kar de aur hamen kshama kar. nishchay hee too har cheez kee saamarthy rakhata hai.
ai nabee! inakaar karanevaalon aur kapataachaariyon se jihaad karo aur unake saath sakhtee se pesh aao. unaka thikaana jahannam hai aur vah antatah pahunchane kee bahut buree jagah hai

allaah ne inakaar karanevaalon ke lie nooh kee stree aur loot kee stree kee misaal pesh kee hai. ve hamaare bandon mein se do nek bandon ke adheen theen. kintu un donon striyon ne unase vishvaasaghaat kiya to allaah ke muqaabale mein unake kuchh kaam na aa sake aur kah diya gaya, "pravesh karanevaalon ke saath donon aag mein pravisht ho jao.

aur eemaan laanevaalon ke lie allaah ne firaun kee stree kee misaal pesh kee hai, jabaki usane kaha, "ai mere rab! too mere lie apane paas jannat mein ek ghar bana aur mujhe firaun aur usake karm se chhutakaara de, aur chhutakaara de mujhe zaalim logon se.

aur imaraan kee betee marayam kee misaal pesh hee hai jisane apane sateetv kee raksha kee thee, phir hamane us stree ke bheetar apanee rooh phoonk dee aur usane apane rab ke bolon aur usakee kitaabon kee pushti kee aur vah bhakti-pravrtt aagyaakaariyon mein se thee
bada barakatavaala hai vah jisake haath mein saaree baadashaahee hai aur vah har cheez kee saamarthy rakhata hai.
jisane paida kiya mrtyu aur jeevan ko, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha kare ki tumamen karm kee drshti se kaun sabase achchha hai. vah prabhutvashaalee, bada kshamaasheel hai.
jisane oopar-tale saat aakaash banae. tum rahamaan kee rachana mein koee asangati aur vishamata na dekhoge. phir nazar daalo, "kya tumhen koee bigaad dikhaee deta hai
phir dobaara nazar daalo. nigaah radd hokar aur thak-haarakar tumhaaree or palat aaegee
hamane nikatavartee aakaash ko deepon se sajaaya aur unhen shaitaanon ke maar bhagaane ka saadhan banaaya aur unake lie hamane bhadakatee aag kee yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai
jin logon ne apane rab ke saath kufr kiya unake lie jahannam kee yaatana hai aur vah bahut hee bura thikaana hai
jab ve usamen daale jaenge to usakee dahaadane kee bhayaanak aavaaz sunenge aur vah prakop se biphar rahee hogee.

aisa prateet hoga ki prakop ke kaaran abhee phat padegee. har baar jab bhee koee samooh usamen daala jaega to usake kaaryakarta unase poochhenge, "kya tumhaare paas koee saavadhaan karanevaala nahin aaya
ve kahenge, "kyon nahin, avashy hamaare paas aaya tha, kintu hamane jhuthala diya aur kaha ki allaah ne kuchh bhee nahin avatarit kiya. tum to bas ek badee gumaraahee mein pade hue ho.
aur ve kahenge, "yadi ham sunate ya buddhi se kaam lete to ham dahakatee aag mein padanevaalon mein sammilit na hote.
is prakaar ve apane gunaahon ko sveekaar karenge, to dhikkaar ho dahakatee aagavaalon par
jo log paroksh mein rahate hue apane rab se darate hai, unake lie kshama aur bada badala hai
tum apanee baat chhipao ya use vyakt karo, vah to seenon mein chhipee baaton tak ko jaanata hai
kya vah nahin jaanega jisane paida kiya? vah sookshmadarshee, khabar rakhanevaala hai
vahee to hai jisane tumhaare lie dharatee ko vasheebhoot kiya. atah tum usake (dharatee ke) kandhon par chalo aur usakee rozee mein se khao, usee kee or dobaara uthakar (jeevit hokar) jaana hai
kya tum usase nishchint ho jo aakaash mein hai ki tumhen dharatee mein dhansa de, phir kya dekhoge ki vah daanvaadol ho rahee hai
ya tum usase nishchint ho jo aakaash mein hai ki vah tumapar patharaav karanevaalee vaayu bhej de? phir tum jaan loge ki meree chetaavanee kaisee hotee hai
un logon ne bhee jhuthalaaya jo unase pahale the, phir kaisa raha mera inakaar
kya unhonne apane oopar pakshiyon ko panktabanddh pankh phailae aur unhen sametate nahin dekha? unhen rahamaan ke siva koee aur nahin thaamen rahata. nishchay hee vah har cheez ko dekhata hai
ya vah kaun hai jo tumhaaree sena banakar rahamaan ke muqaabale mein tumhaaree sahaayata kare. inakaar karanevaale to bas dhokhe mein pade hue hai
ya vah kaun hai jo tumhen rozee de, yadi vah apanee rozee rok le? nahin, balki ve to sarakashee aur nafarat hee par ade hue hai
to kya vah vyakti jo apane munh ke bal aundha chalata ho vah adhik seedhe maarg par ha ya vah jo seedha hokar seedhe maarg par chal raha hai
kah do, "vahee hai jisane tumhen paida kiya aur tumhaare lie kaan aur aankhe aur dil banae. tum krtagyata thode hee dikhaate ho.
kah do, "vahee hai jisane tumhen dharatee mein phailaaya aur usee kee or tum ekatr kie ja rahe ho.
ve kahate hai, "yadi tum sachche ho to yah vaada kab poora hoga
kah do, "isaka gyaan to bas allaah hee ke paas hai aur main to ek spasht. sachet karanevaala hoon.
phir jab ve use nikat dekhenge to un logon ke chehare bigad jaenge jinhonne inakaar kee neeti apanaee; aur kaha jaega, "yahee hai vah cheez jisakee tum maang kar rahe the.
kaho, "kya tumane yah bhee socha ki yadi allaah mujhe aur unhen bhee, jo mere saath hai, vinasht hee kar de ya vah ham par daya kare, aakhir inakaar karanevaalon ko dukhad yaatana se kaun panaah dega
kah do, "vah rahamaan hai. usee par ham eemaan lae hai aur usee par hamane bharosa kiya. to sheeghr hee tumhen maaloom ho jaega ki khulee gumaraahee mein kaun pada hua hai.
kaho, "kya tumane yah bhee socha ki yadi tumhaara paanee (dharatee mein) neeche utar jae to phir kaun tumhen laakar dega nirmal pravaahit jal
